data.eml:eml: Comments on the holotype of Alburnus kurui Mangit & Yerli 2018 and re-description of A. carianorum Freyhof, Kaya, Bayçelebi, Geiger & Turan, 2019 (Teleostei: Leuciscidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freyhof, Jörg, Kaya, Cüneyt, Bayçelebi, Esra, Geiger, Matthias, Turan, Davut (2019): Comments on the holotype of Alburnus kurui Mangit & Yerli 2018 and re-description of A. carianorum Freyhof, Kaya, Bayçelebi, Geiger & Turan, 2019 (Teleostei: Leuciscidae). Zootaxa 4550 (4): 594-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.4.10
